value.title: Adapting To The New AI Landscape And Planning Tomorrow's New Normal
value.excerpt: As pressure to do AI right and unlock the value it promises increases, it's time to think differently to navigate the uncharted digital waters ahead.

value.title: The Role Of AI In Carbon Reduction And Increased Efficiency For Energy
value.excerpt: Transitioning the energy industry from primarily oil and gas to more renewable sources won’t happen overnight.

value.title: Ataccama announces new AI-driven release of data governance/management platform
value.excerpt: Ataccama ONE Gen2, featuring new "Core AI" module, seeks to automate large swaths of organizations' increasingly complex data governance and data management burdens. Other main pillars of Gen2's self-driving capability include metadata-centricity and policy management with automated enforcement.

value.title: EY India acquires AI-based startup Spotmentor Technologies
value.excerpt: Spotmentor is an end-to-end skilling platform to help businesses identify skills required for the future of work, upskilling and reskilling talent at scale

value.title: Onevinn AB Joins the Microsoft Intelligent Security Association
value.excerpt: Onevinn offers Managed Detection and Response (MDR) services on the Microsoft Azure Marketplace and deepens collaboration with Microsoft

value.title: FPGA-based inference accelerator outscores GPUs and ASICs in MLPerf benchmark
value.excerpt: Mispology's FPGA-based Zebra AI inference accelerator outperformed Nvidia A100, V100, Tesla T4, AWS Inferencia, Google TPUv3, and others, on the ResNet 50 architecture in ML inference efficiency.

value.title: Dissecting C3.ai’s secret sauce: less about AI, more about fixing Hadoop
value.excerpt: While C3.ai claims to be an AI company, its patented technology is really a platform-as-a-service for the Internet of Things with some fairly standard AI mixed in.

value.title: This open-source AI tool can make your video spectacular with sky replacement effects

value.title: Nvidia unveils new DGX Station AI workstation, joining market for AI appliances
value.excerpt: The GPU maker uses the annual SC20 supercomputing event to unveil a desktop model of AI computer with a new GPU.

value.title: Fujitsu to develop supercomputer for AI research in Japan
value.excerpt: The 'AI bridging green cloud infrastructure supercomputer' will feature 120 nodes, 11.2 petabytes of storage, and is expected to reach peak performance of 19.3 petaflops.

value.title: Austria wants ethical rules on battlefield killer robots – Jaweb
value.excerpt: Vienna is embarking on a diplomatic initiative to draw up an ethical framework for the use of killer robots on the battlefields of the future. Foreign Minister Alexander Schallenberg said similar standards should be adopted as those established for landmines and cluster weapons.

value.title: Why we commissioned new AI, Robotics Centre in Abuja ― Pantami
value.excerpt: The Minister of Communications and Digital Economy, Dr Isa Ali Pantami says the new Centre for Artificial Intelligence and Robotics.

value.title: Zipper Merging Is A Frenzied Traffic Squeeze Play On Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Zipper merging, whereby cars are shunted into a 2-into-1 lane narrowing, can be especially tough on self-driving cars.

value.title: Training facial recognition on some new furry friends: Bears
value.excerpt: Ed Miller and Mary Nguyen are Silicon Valley software developers by day, but moonlight at solving an unusually fuzzy problem.

value.title: It’s Managers, Not Workers, Who Are Losing Jobs To AI And Robots, Study Shows
value.excerpt: This is a class of people we did not expect robots to have an effect. Because managers, by definition, supervise other human beings, so we really cannot replace their functions until the singularity occurs with artificial general intelligence.

value.title: Computer vision mobile app can regularly monitor diabetes
value.excerpt: University of Cambridge engineers has developed a computer vision technology into a free mobile phone app for regular monitoring of glucose levels in people with diabetes. The app uses computer vision techniques to read and record the glucose levels,

value.title: China Gets Ready to Rein in Baidu, Alibaba, and Tencent
value.excerpt: Newly drafted antitrust rules could make it tougher for the BAT triumvirate to continue expanding their ecosystems.

value.title: You can’t eliminate bias from machine learning, but you can pick your bias

value.title: How The Department Of The Air Force Is Driving Forward With AI
value.excerpt: Leaders such as Ms. Eileen Vidrine, who is the Chief Data Officer at the Department of the Air Force understand the importance of adopting tools such as advanced data analytics, AI, and ML to help in the increasingly disruptive battlefield.

value.title: GeekWire Podcast: AI that writes your emails; a Seattle tech visionary; and our trivia challenge returns
value.excerpt: OthersideAI thinks it can help you be more productive by using artificial intelligence to write your emails for you. But is that really a good idea? The months-old firm received a $2.6 million seed round this week.

value.title: Uber reportedly may sell its self-driving car division to rival Aurora
value.excerpt: Uber is in talks to sell its autonomous vehicle unit to startup competitor Aurora Innovation, TechCrunch reported. If it comes to pass, the sale of Uber Advanced Technologies Group (UberATG), would mark the end of a bumpy road for a division of Uber that was valued at $7.

value.title: EY India acquires IIT alumni backed AI startup Spotmentor Technologies
value.excerpt: EY India has acquired an artificial intelligence backed human resource technology startup Spotmentor Technologies. The company, however, did not disclose the financial transaction involved in the deal.

value.title: Velodyne aims to price new self-driving car sensor below $500
value.excerpt: Velodyne Lidar Inc said on Friday it would introduce a new lidar unit, a key sensor in self-driving cars, with a target price point of less than $500 and no moving parts.

value.title: Nigerian govt to create jobs through robotics, artificial intelligence
